com.digits.sdk.android

Class DigitsAuthConfig.Builder

  • Object
    • com.digits.sdk.android.DigitsAuthConfig.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DigitsAuthConfig

    public static class DigitsAuthConfig.Builder
extends Object
    Digits Auth Config Builder

    Used to build a Digits Auth Config object DigitsAuthConfig Use withAuthCallBack(com.digits.sdk.android.AuthCallback) followed by build() 

     // Example
 Builder digitsAuthConfigBuilder = new DigitsAuthConfig.Builder()
       .withAuthCallBack(callback)
       .withPhoneNumber("+12345677832")
       .withEmailCollection()
       .withThemeResId(R.style.LightTheme);
 Digits.authenticate(digitsAuthConfigBuilder.build());

      • withEmailCollection

        public DigitsAuthConfig.Builder withEmailCollection(boolean collectEmail)
        Turns email collection on/off
        Parameters:
        collectEmail - Should collect email in the auth flow

      • withPhoneNumber

        public DigitsAuthConfig.Builder withPhoneNumber(String phoneNumber)
        Set default phoneNumber.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number to authenticate

      • withAuthCallBack

        public DigitsAuthConfig.Builder withAuthCallBack(AuthCallback authCallback)
        Set auth callback.
        Parameters:
        authCallback - AuthCallback to be called with the authentication result, or null if no callback is needed. Digits holds a weak reference to this object, therefore the caller should have a strong reference to this object or it will never receive the result.

      • withThemeResId

        public DigitsAuthConfig.Builder withThemeResId(int themeResId)
        Set theme resource id.
        Parameters:
        themeResId - Theme resource id

      • withCustomPhoneNumberScreen

        public DigitsAuthConfig.Builder withCustomPhoneNumberScreen(ConfirmationCodeCallback confirmationCodeCallback)
        Set confirmationCodeCallback to be used for a custom phone number entry screen
        Parameters:
        confirmationCodeCallback - ConfirmationCodeCallback to be called when digits sends a confirmation code to the phone number set via withPhoneNumber(String) method. Must be used only by apps that have their own phone number entry screen. Setting this will bypass the digits phone number screen.

      • withPartnerKey

        public DigitsAuthConfig.Builder withPartnerKey(String partnerKey)

        public DigitsAuthConfig build()
        Returns DigitsAuthConfig constructed using the builder.
